sub_title: Country Manager The Netherlands at ISPROX | Multilingual Professionals | International Recruitment | Technical Recruitment | Global Consulting Services | Hospitality Industry Worldwide
summary:
Dynamic, proactive, and service minded recruitment professional with more than 20 years solid international expertise on legal matters and consulting services, flexible and able to maintain a high level of confidentiality and discretion. 

At ISPROX we offer consulting services and assist companies and candidates with tailor-made solutions to their professional needs.  We aim to select talent for companies that best care for human capital and have the people at the heart of their policies. 

I have strong communication, organizational and negotiation skills. Resilient by nature, autodidact, accessible. and wee count with the expertise of a teams of consultants with great attention to detail and results-oriented. 

Proficient in the performance of managerial and administrative tasks, creative problem solving. Affinity with sports: Ex-Athlete. Venezuelan Athletics Federation (Track & Field) hurdler and high jumper. Nowadays active tennis and #Padeladdict Padel player (club competition level, affiliated to KNLTB)

education.field_of_study: Judicial and Political Sciencies - Law School

profile_positions.location: Rotterdam–The Hague metropolitan area, South Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description: As the Country Manager for The Netherlands, I am playing a pivotal role in leading ISPROX's operations and driving growth in the country and internationally. My responsibilities encompass nurturing client relationships, strategizing market expansion with multinational companies in The Netherlands, and ensuring effective communication with clients and candidates. Additionally, I am instrumental in fostering a high-performing team, forging key partnerships, and spearheading the overall success of ISPROX in The Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Country Manager

profile_positions.description: At ISPROX, we are guided by a strong belief that our objectives, work approach, solutions, and actions should always be rooted in our core values, which are embraced by our entire team. Our primary mission is to select top talent for companies that truly value their human capital and prioritize people-centric policies. We serve a diverse client base, catering to both listed companies and SMEs aiming to elevate the professionalism of their teams.
profile_positions.title: Associate Recruitment Partner

profile_positions.location: Capelle aan den IJssel, South Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description: As Senior Recruitment Consultant within iPS Powerful People new branch iPS Select we assisted our clients with recruiting high management and top qualified candidates to fill open positions within multiple industries such as Maritime, Oil & Gas, and Civil Engineering. Consistently building professional partnerships through client relationships,  generating business through remarkable account management. Conduct a variety of candidates presentations in order to demonstrate high management recruitment strategies. Maintenance and analysis of weekly reports to gain insight into clients hiring needs and fulfilment for different departments within iPS Powerful People organization. Create communication strategies and drafted templates that helps run a streamlined consultancy with different department heads, and gain higher involvement in recruiting processes, and other consulting services.
profile_positions.title: Senior Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.location: Capelle aan den IJssel, South Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
Scope of responsibilities as a Senior Recruitment Consultant at iPS Powerful People, included to maintain constant contact with Candidates and Clients. Identified opportunities in the market providing customers within Maritime, Energy, and Engineering industries with high qualified specialists in their fields.
Conducted interviews; attendance of weekly meetings. Database maintenance and organisational structure development.
profile_positions.title: Senior Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.location: The Hague, South Holland Province, Netherlands
profile_positions.description: Part of USG People. Responsible for finding the right match between candidates, vacancies, and organizations. First contact point for both existing and new clients, recruiting multilingual candidates both in the Netherlands and abroad. Responsible for the whole recruitment process, maintaining close contact with clients regarding their requirements, fees and handling negotiations. Managing of FMS (candidates and clients database), SAP and other integrated systems. LinkedIn recruitment, posting vacancies at dashboards, collaboration with other Consultants in search assignments. Key responsibilities: Handling the full recruitment cycle, from conducting (behavioural) interviews, assessing and qualifying candidates to the offer stage;  In charge of own portfolio of clients, including negotiating, consulting and advising on the recruitment process and best practices;  Account management: developing and maintaining relationships with clients, incl. quarterly meetings and yearly evaluations (responsible for top revenue clients);  HR Administration: handling contractual matters, sickness, vacation days, performance evaluations, trainings, 30% ruling…; Participating and organizing job-fairs & other UML events (for clients and candidates);  Participating in project groups (social media, growth hacking). This international department has been eliminated from Unique and all consultants placed in other departments or left the company through an agreement.
profile_positions.title: International Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for attracting candidates for permanent positions through various strategies such as advertising, networking, headhunting, and referrals. I screened and interviewed candidates, conducting thorough background checks to ensure their suitability for the available positions.
Additionally, I provided support to both clients and candidates throughout the recruitment process. This included assessing salary levels, negotiating contracts, identifying training requirements, and presenting career opportunities. By staying updated with industry trends and market demands, I consistently enhanced our recruitment strategies to deliver optimal outcomes. Building strong relationships based on open communication and professionalism, I served as a trusted advisor, contributing to the growth and success of individuals and organizations in the dynamic hospitality industry.
profile_positions.title: Senior Executive Recruitment Consultant - Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
Consulting and Recruitment Company specializing in the search, recruitment, and placement of executive staff within the global hospitality industry. We efficiently manage the entire recruitment process, providing expert guidance to both candidates and clients throughout the entire journey. Our services include conducting interviews, diligent follow-up with candidates, meticulous selection and qualification of candidates, as well as marketing and recruiting exceptional multilingual professionals. Additionally, we excel in crafting compelling job descriptions and search assignments that align with our clients' requirements, ensuring the perfect match between candidate profiles and organizational needs.

We are adept at leveraging social media platforms to expand our network, effectively managing accounts, and generating valuable business leads. Our strategic advertising and promotion initiatives extend beyond internal channels, targeting external networks to attract top talent. We possess exceptional negotiation skills when it comes to contract discussions with clients, adeptly addressing fees, and facilitating dialogue with candidates regarding vacancies, salaries, and job conditions.
profile_positions.title: Executive Recruitment Consultant - Manager

company.name: Hospitality Management Search International / Cornell Executive Recruitment

profile_positions.company: Hospitality Management Search International / Cornell Executive Recruitment
profile_positions.description: Consulting company  dedicated to searching, selecting, and placing management positions within the hospitality industry worldwide. Provided assistance to the Executive Director in the administrative operations of the company. Started as a Recruiter and subsequently obtained the position of Senior Executive Consultant at sister company, Cornell Executive Recruitment. Gained experience in all phases of the recruitment process and responsible for managing and supervising a team of 6 junior recruiters. Also attended international world fairs (ITB Berlin, WTM London) to expand network. In charge of special search assignments, conducting candidate interviews, and ensuring the maintenance of the candidate's database. Additionally, actively contributed to business development efforts and handled corporate recruitment for specific industry clients, including negotiating contracts and fees. Our successful placements included candidates within luxury hotel organizations in various countries such as the Dominican Republic, Mexico, Guatemala, The Netherlands, Germany, Italy, United Kingdom, Egypt, Qatar, India and Seychelles.
profile_positions.title: Senior Executive Recruiter / Executive Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.description: International investment and banking firm, focused   on private capital developed and emerging markets committed given to provide financial services. Main functions included supporting to the different Executive Directors, events coordination and organization of the weekly Executive Committee, administrative and clerical tasks.
profile_positions.title: Executive Assistant to Managing Director

profile_positions.description: Coordination of activities of the mayor’s office,  assistance to the human resources Director in the follow-up of administrative procedures to select, recruit, hire or dismiss public administration employees, coordination of events held in the Chamber of the Municipality. Facilitator in the implementation of international agreements with other municipalities including the New York City Hall, Bilbao’s Municipality, Spain and Jerusalem’s Municipality, Israel.
profile_positions.title: Legal Affairs Assistant

profile_positions.description: Under the supervision and instructions of the Superior judge in charge of the elaboration of criminal sentences in the Judicial District of the Federal District. Assistance to the judge in the coordination of legal acts and communication with the first instance courts.
profile_positions.title: Executive Legal Assistant
